---
title: "Note about the dc_reflib images"
---

All of the images presented within `dc_reflib` that are not obviously data plots or otherwise explicitly sourced are created with permissively licensed generative AI using "causal" prompts. 

I probably used [Stable Diffusion](https://huggingface.co/spaces/stabilityai/stable-diffusion), but your mileage may vary.

Here's some fun examples:
